name: UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment
desc: Constants for specifying the vertical alignment of content (text and images) in a control.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Aligns the content vertically in the center of the control.

items.name: case top
items.desc: Aligns the content vertically at the top in the control (the default).

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: Aligns the content vertically at the bottom in the control

items.name: case fill
items.desc: Aligns the content vertically to fill the content rectangle; images may be stretched.
